pksav_trainer_id Union Reference

Native storage for a Pokémon trainer's in-game ID (Generation III+). More...

Detailed Description

Native storage for a Pokémon trainer's in-game ID (Generation III+).

Field Documentation

◆ pid

uint16_t pksav_trainer_id::pid

Public ID.

This is the value shown in-game.

This value is stored in little-endian and should be accessed and modified with pksav_littleendian16.

◆ sid

uint16_t pksav_trainer_id::sid

Secret ID.

This value is never shown in-game and exists to prevent ID collision, as many more than 65536 people play these games.

This value is stored in little-endian and should be accessed and modified with pksav_littleendian16.

◆ [struct]

struct { ... } pksav_trainer_id

Convenience struct to allow individual access to secret and public IDs.

◆ id

uint32_t pksav_trainer_id::id

Full ID.

This value is never shown in-game.

This value is stored in little-endian and should be accessed and modified with pksav_littleendian32.
